TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Cache extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class Cache Implements IEnumerable
public ref class Cache sealed : System::Collections::IEnumerable

summary.span: 实现 Web 应用程序的缓存。

span.span: Implements the cache for a Web application.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个应用程序域创建一个此类的实例，只要应用程序域将保持活动状态，保持有效。One instance of this class is created per application domain, and it remains valid as long as the application domain remains active. 有关此类的实例的信息，请通过`Cache`的属性对象或`Cache`属性的对象。Information about an instance of this class is available through the `Cache` property of the object or the `Cache` property of the object. > [!NOTE] > 类不适合在 ASP.NET 应用程序外部使用。The class is not intended for use outside of ASP.NET applications. 它是设计和测试在提供的 Web 应用程序中缓存的 ASP.NET 中使用。It was designed and tested for use in ASP.NET to provide caching for Web applications. 对于其他类型的应用程序，如控制台应用程序或 Windows 窗体应用程序，请使用类。For other types of applications, such as console applications or Windows Forms applications, use the class. ## Examples 以下示例是一个页面，向用户显示分配给在缓存中的项的值，并从缓存移除项时通知他们。The following example is a page that shows users the value assigned to an item in the cache, and then notifies them when the item is removed from the cache. 它会创建`RemovedCallback`方法，它具有签名的`CacheItemRemovedCallback`委托，以通知用户，当删除缓存项，并且它使用枚举告诉用户移除的原因。It creates a `RemovedCallback` method, which has the signature of the `CacheItemRemovedCallback` delegate, to notify users when the cache item is removed, and it uses the enumeration to tell them why it was removed. 此外，它使用属性向缓存添加对象和检索这些对象的值。In addition, it uses the property to add objects to the cache and retrieve the value of those objects. 在中`AddItemToCache`方法，它将使用方法将项添加到缓存。In the `AddItemToCache` method, it uses the method to add an item to the cache. 若要使用`CacheItemRemovedCallback`委派，您必须使用此方法将项添加到缓存或方法，因此，ASP.NET 可以自动进行适当的方法调用时删除该项。To use the `CacheItemRemovedCallback` delegate, you must add an item to the cache with this method or the method, so that that ASP.NET can automatically make the proper method calls when the item is removed. 自定义`RemoveItemFromCache`方法使用方法以显式从缓存中删除项导致`RemovedCallback`要调用的方法。The custom `RemoveItemFromCache` method uses the method to explicitly delete the item from the cache, causing the `RemovedCallback` method to be invoked. > [!NOTE] > 可通过下面的代码片段的缓存的实例是成员此示例将继承的对象。The instance of Cache that is accessed by the snippet below is a member of the object that this sample inherits. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.
Caching Application Data

param.name: key
param.span: 用于引用该项的缓存键。

span.span: The cache key used to reference the item.

param.name: value
param.span: 要添加到缓存的项。

span.span: The item to be added to the cache.

param.name: dependencies
param.span: 该项的文件依赖项或缓存键依赖项。

span.span: The file or cache key dependencies for the item.

param.span: 当任何依赖项更改时，该对象即无效，并从缓存中移除。

span.span: When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache.

param.span: 如果没有依赖项，则此参数包含 。

span.span: If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains .

param.name: absoluteExpiration
param.span: 所添加对象将到期并被从缓存中移除的时间。

span.span: The time at which the added object expires and is removed from the cache.

param.span: 如果使用可调到期，则 absoluteExpiration 参数必须为 。

span.span: If you are using sliding expiration, the absoluteExpiration parameter must be .

param.name: slidingExpiration
param.span: 最后一次访问所添加对象时与该对象到期时之间的时间间隔。

span.span: The interval between the time the added object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires.

param.span: 如果该值等效于 20 分钟，则对象在最后一次被访问 20 分钟之后将到期并从缓存中移除。

span.span: If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object expires and is removed from the cache 20 minutes after it is last accessed.

param.span: 如果使用绝对到期，则 slidingExpiration 参数必须为 。

span.span: If you are using absolute expiration, the slidingExpiration parameter must be .

param.name: priority
param.span: 对象的相对成本，由 枚举表示。

span.span: The relative cost of the object, as expressed by the enumeration.

param.span: 缓存在退出对象时使用该值；具有较低成本的对象在具有较高成本的对象之前被从缓存移除。

span.span: The cache uses this value when it evicts objects; objects with a lower cost are removed from the cache before objects with a higher cost.

param.name: onRemoveCallback
param.span: 在从缓存中移除对象时所调用的委托（如果提供）。

span.span: A delegate that, if provided, is called when an object is removed from the cache.

param.span: 当从缓存中删除应用程序的对象时，可使用它来通知应用程序。

span.span: You can use this to notify applications when their objects are deleted from the cache.

summary.span: 将指定项添加到 对象，该对象具有依赖项、到期和优先级策略以及一个委托（可用于在从 移除插入项时通知应用程序）。

span.span: Adds the specified item to the object with dependencies, expiration and priority policies, and a delegate you can use to notify your application when the inserted item is removed from the .

returns.span: 如果添加的项之前存储在缓存中，则为表示该项的对象；否则为 。

span.span: An object that represents the item that was added if the item was previously stored in the cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有相同的项，对此方法的调用将失败`key`参数已存储在`Cache`。Calls to this method will fail if an item with the same `key` parameter is already stored in the `Cache`. 若要覆盖现有`Cache`项使用的相同`key`参数，请使用方法。To overwrite an existing `Cache` item using the same `key` parameter, use the method. 不能同时设置`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`参数。You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters. 如果你想要在特定时间过期的缓存项，则设置`absoluteExpiration`参数为特定的时间，并`slidingExpiration`参数。If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to . 如果想要的缓存项在一段时间后过期后已经过去上次访问该项，则设置`slidingExpiration`过期时间间隔，参数和`absoluteExpiration`参数。If you intend the cache item to expire after a certain amount of time has passed since the item was last accessed, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to . ## Examples 下面的示例创建`AddItemToCache`方法。The following example creates an `AddItemToCache` method. 当调用此方法时，它会设置`itemRemoved`属性设置为`false`，并将注册`onRemove`方法替换的新实例委托。When this method is called, it sets an `itemRemoved` property to `false` and registers an `onRemove` method with a new instance of the delegate. 在使用委托的签名`RemovedCallback`方法。The delegate's signature is used in the `RemovedCallback` method. `AddItemToCache`方法会检查与关联的值`Key1`密钥缓存中。The `AddItemToCache` method then checks the value associated with the `Key1` key in the cache. 如果值为`null`，则`Add`方法使用的密钥在缓存中放置一项`Key1`，值为`Value 1`，绝对的过期时间为 60 秒和较高的缓存的优先级。If the value is `null`, the `Add` method places an item in the cache with a key of `Key1`, a value of `Value 1`, an absolute expiration of 60 seconds, and a high cache priority. 它还使用`onRemove`作为参数的方法。It also uses the `onRemove` method as an argument. 这允许`RemovedCallback`从缓存中删除此项时要调用的方法。This allows the `RemovedCallback` method to be called when this item is removed from the cache. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何使用的示例类和委托中，请参阅[缓存应用程序数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d(v=vs.100))。For examples of how to use the class and the delegate, see [Caching Application Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 获取缓存中存储的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items stored in the cache.
The number of items stored in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 监视应用程序的性能时，或使用 ASP.NET 跟踪功能时，此属性会非常有用。This property can be useful when monitoring your application's performance or when using ASP.NET tracing functionality. ## Examples 以下示例获取的值`Count`属性，将其转换为字符串，并将字符串赋给的属性Web 服务器控件`Label1`。The following example obtains the value of the `Count` property, converts it to a string, and assigns the string to the property of a Web server control, `Label1`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count/CS/cachecountcs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count/VB/cachecountvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public long EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit { get; }
.property instance int64 EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit
Public ReadOnly Property EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit As Long
public: property long EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit { long get(); };
member this.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit : int64

summary.span: 获取在 ASP.NET 开始从缓存中移除项之前应用程序可使用的物理内存百分比。

span.span: Gets the percentage of physical memory that can be consumed by an application before ASP.NET starts removing items from the cache.

value.span: 可供应用程序使用的物理内存百分比。

span.span: The percentage of physical memory available to the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将返回到应用程序可用的物理内存的百分比。The property returns the percentage of physical memory that is available to the application. 当可用百分比低，缓存算法将开始从缓存中删除项。When the available percentage becomes low, the cache algorithm begins removing items from the cache. 属性可以设置与`percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit`的属性[caching （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的 cache 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299)应用程序的配置文件中的元素。The property can be set with the `percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit` attribute of the [cache Element for caching (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299) element in the application's configuration file. 如果`percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit`未设置属性时，缓存算法将确定缓存的最大大小和计算属性。If the `percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit` attribute is not set, the cache algorithm determines the maximum size of the cache, and the property is calculated. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public long EffectivePrivateBytesLimit { get; }
.property instance int64 EffectivePrivateBytesLimit
Public ReadOnly Property EffectivePrivateBytesLimit As Long
public: property long EffectivePrivateBytesLimit { long get(); };
member this.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit : int64

summary.span: 获取可用于缓存的字节数。

span.span: Gets the number of bytes available for the cache.
The number of bytes available for the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将返回可由应用程序进程的字节数。The property returns the number of bytes that can be used by the application process. 一旦达到此限制，缓存算法开始积极清理缓存。Once this limit is reached, the cache algorithm begins aggressively scavenging the cache. 属性可以设置与`privateBytesLimit`的属性[caching （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的 cache 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299)应用程序的配置文件中的元素。The property can be set with the `privateBytesLimit` attribute of the [cache Element for caching (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299) element in the application's configuration file. 当`privateBytesLimit`未设置属性时，缓存算法将确定缓存的最大大小和属性包含所选算法的大小。When the `privateBytesLimit` attribute is not set, the cache algorithm determines the maximum size of the cache, and the property contains the size chosen by the algorithm. ## Examples

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以添加到或从缓存中时此方法枚举项删除项。Items can be added to or removed from the cache while this method is enumerating through the items. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象， `CacheEnum`，并使用`GetEnumerator`方法。The following example creates an object, `CacheEnum`, using the `GetEnumerator` method. 枚举器经过缓存中，将每个缓存项的值转换为字符串，，然后将值写入 Web 窗体页。The enumerator moves through the cache, converts the value of each cached item to a string, and then writes the values to a Web Forms page. [!code-csharp[Cache.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache.GetEnumerator/CS/getenumcs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Cache.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache.GetEnumerator/VB/getenumvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将覆盖其键与匹配现有的缓存项`key`参数。This method will overwrite an existing cache item whose key matches the `key` parameter. 对象添加到缓存中使用的此重载`Insert`方法插入没有文件或缓存依赖项，优先级为、 可调过期值，且绝对过期值为。The object added to the cache using this overload of the `Insert` method is inserted with no file or cache dependencies, a priority of , a sliding expiration value of , and an absolute expiration value of . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何向应用程序的缓存中插入项。The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into an application's cache. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将覆盖其键与匹配现有的缓存项`key`参数。This method will overwrite an existing cache item whose key matches the `key` parameter. 对象添加到缓存中使用的此重载`Insert`方法插入没有文件或缓存依赖项，优先级为、 可调过期值，且绝对过期值为。The object added to the cache using this overload of the `Insert` method is inserted with no file or cache dependencies, a priority of , a sliding expiration value of , and an absolute expiration value of . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将某个项插入到 XML 配置文件的缓存依赖的应用程序的缓存。The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into an application's cache with a cache dependency on an XML configuration file. param.span: 上次访问插入对象的时间与对象过期时间之间的间隔。

span.span: The interval between the time the inserted object is last accessed and the time at which that object expires.

param.span: 如果此值为 20 分钟的等效值，此对象将过期并将在上次访问后 20 分钟从缓存中删除。

span.span: If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object will expire and be removed from the cache 20 minutes after it was last accessed.

param.span: 如果使用可调到期，则 absoluteExpiration 参数必须为 。

span.span: If you are using sliding expiration, the absoluteExpiration parameter must be .

summary.span: 向 中插入具有依赖项和到期策略的对象。

span.span: Inserts an object into the with dependencies and expiration policies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将覆盖现有`Cache`具有相同的项`key`参数。This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter. 如果`slidingExpiration`参数设置为，可调过期已禁用。If the `slidingExpiration` parameter is set to , sliding expiration is disabled. 如果您设置`slidingExpiration`参数为大于，则`absoluteExpiration`参数设置为中包含的值以及`slidingExpiration`参数。If you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to greater than , the `absoluteExpiration` parameter is set to plus the value contained in the `slidingExpiration` parameter. 如果之前指定的时间量从缓存请求的内容项`absoluteExpiration`参数，该项将放在缓存中同样，并`absoluteExpiration`再次将设置为`DateTime.Now`中包含的值以及`slidingExpiration`参数。If the item is requested from the cache before the amount of time specified by the `absoluteExpiration` parameter, the item will be placed in the cache again, and `absoluteExpiration` will again be set to `DateTime.Now` plus the value contained in the `slidingExpiration` parameter. 如果该项未请求从缓存中的日期之前`absoluteExpiration`从缓存中删除参数，该项目。If the item is not requested from the cache before the date in the `absoluteExpiration` parameter, the item is removed from the cache. .. 优先级为插入项添加到缓存中使用 insert 方法的此重载。The item added to the cache using this overload of the insert method is inserted with a priority of . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将某个项插入到具有绝对过期的应用程序的缓存。The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into an application's cache with an absolute expiration. > [!NOTE] > 由于这种形式的`Insert`方法支持缓存依赖项，如果该项没有依赖关系，您必须声明`dependency`参数，因为`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 以逗号分隔的参数列表中。Since this form of the `Insert` method supports cache dependencies, if the item has no dependencies, you must declare the `dependency` parameter as `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the comma-delimited list of parameters. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何将某个项插入到缓存具有可调过期。The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into the cache with a sliding expiration. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: To avoid possible issues with local time such as changes from standard time to daylight saving time, use instead of for this parameter value.

span.span: If you are using absolute expiration, the slidingExpiration parameter must be set to .

span.span: The interval between the time that the cached object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires.

param.span: 如果此值为 20 分钟的等效值，此对象将过期并将在上次访问后 20 分钟从缓存中删除。

span.span: If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object will expire and be removed from the cache 20 minutes after it was last accessed.

param.span: 如果使用可调到期，则 absoluteExpiration 参数必须设置为 。

summary.span: 将对象与依赖项、到期策略以及可用于在从缓存中移除项之前通知应用程序的委托一起插入到 对象中。

span.span: Inserts an object into the object together with dependencies, expiration policies, and a delegate that you can use to notify the application before the item is removed from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，可在缓存中插入新项并提供从缓存中移除项之前调用的委托。The method enables you to insert a new item in the cache and provide a delegate that is called before the item is removed from the cache. 在委托中，可以更新缓存的项，从而阻止其从缓存中删除。In the delegate, you can update the cached item and thereby prevent it from being removed from the cache. 此方法将覆盖现有`Cache`具有相同的项`key`参数。This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter. 不能同时设置`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`参数。You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters. 如果你想要在特定时间过期的缓存项，则设置`absoluteExpiration`参数为特定的时间，并`slidingExpiration`参数。If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to . 如果想要的缓存项一项以来的时间段后过期上次访问，则设置`slidingExpiration`到过期时间间隔，并且您的参数设置`absoluteExpiration`参数。If you intend the cache item to expire after a set period of time since the item was last accessed, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to .

param.name: slidingExpiration
param.span: 最后一次访问所插入对象时与该对象到期时之间的时间间隔。

span.span: The interval between the time the inserted object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires.

param.name: priority
param.span: 该对象相对于缓存中存储的其他项的成本，由 枚举表示。

span.span: The cost of the object relative to other items stored in the cache, as expressed by the enumeration.

param.span: 该值由缓存在退出对象时使用；具有较低成本的对象在具有较高成本的对象之前被从缓存移除。

span.span: This value is used by the cache when it evicts objects; objects with a lower cost are removed from the cache before objects with a higher cost.

param.name: onRemoveCallback
param.span: 在从缓存中移除对象时将调用的委托（如果提供）。

span.span: You can use this to notify applications when their objects are deleted from the cache.

summary.span: 向 对象中插入对象，后者具有依赖项、到期和优先级策略以及一个委托（可用于在从 移除插入项时通知应用程序）。

span.span: Inserts an object into the object with dependencies, expiration and priority policies, and a delegate you can use to notify your application when the inserted item is removed from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将覆盖现有`Cache`具有相同的项`key`参数。This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter. 不能同时设置`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`参数。You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters. 如果你想要在特定时间过期的缓存项，则设置`absoluteExpiration`参数为特定的时间，并`slidingExpiration`参数。If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to . 如果想要的缓存项在一段时间后过期传递自上次访问该项，则设置`slidingExpiration`过期时间间隔，参数和`absoluteExpiration`参数。If you intend the cache item to expire after a certain amount of time has passed since the last access to the item, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将其插入到您的应用程序时，分配项高优先级`Cache`对象。The following example demonstrates how to assign an item high priority when you insert it into your application's `Cache` object. > [!NOTE] > 详细了解如何使用此方法替换委派，请参阅[如何： 通知应用程序时项已从缓存](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/38c33aa0-afe9-40ba-a1a4-1ebab95286ef)。For more information about how to use this method with the delegate, see [How to: Notify an Application When an Item Is Removed from the Cache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/38c33aa0-afe9-40ba-a1a4-1ebab95286ef). [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert3 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert3 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

The specified cache item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性，检索指定的缓存项的值，或将注册表项和密钥为其添加到缓存。You can use this property to retrieve the value of a specified cache item, or to add an item and a key for it to the cache. 添加的缓存项使用属性相当于调用方法。Adding a cache item using the property is equivalent to calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Item`属性来检索缓存的对象与关联的值`Key1`密钥。The following example uses the `Item` property to retrieve the value of a cached object associated with the `Key1` key. 然后，它使用方法以将值和介绍性文本和 B HTML 元素写入到 Web 窗体页。It then uses the method to write the value and introductory text and the B HTML element to a Web Forms page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#5)] 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性向缓存中插入文本框的值。The following example demonstrates using this property to insert the value of a text box into the cache. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 用于 方法调用中的 参数中以指示项从不到期。

span.span: Used in the parameter in an method call to indicate the item should never expire.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时，此字段设置`absoluteExpiration`参数等于，这是一个常量，表示最大可能`DateTime`值，12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM。When used, this field sets the `absoluteExpiration` parameter equal to , which is a constant representing the largest possible `DateTime` value, 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`NoAbsoluteExpiration`字段中插入项时禁用绝对过期`Cache`。The following example demonstrates how to use the `NoAbsoluteExpiration` field to disable absolute expirations when inserting an item in the `Cache`. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 用作 或 方法调用中的 参数，以禁用可调到期。

span.span: Used as the parameter in an or method call to disable sliding expirations.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时，此字段设置`slidingExpiration`参数字段，常量值为零。When used, this field sets the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the field, which has a constant value of zero. 根据所使用的缓存的项过期`absoluteExpiration`参数与关联`Insert`或`Add`方法调用。The cached item expires in accordance with the `absoluteExpiration` parameter associated with the `Insert` or `Add` method call. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 Insert 方法将项添加到对象使用`NoSlidingExpiration`字段。The following example demonstrates how to use the Insert method to add an item to the object using the `NoSlidingExpiration` field. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建`RemoveItemFromCache`方法。The following example creates a `RemoveItemFromCache` method. 调用此方法时，它使用要检查缓存中是否包含与之关联的对象属性`Key1`密钥值。When this method is called, it uses the property to check whether the cache contains an object that is associated with a `Key1` key value. 如果是这样，`Remove`调用方法来删除该对象。If it does, the `Remove` method is called to remove the object.
